job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: The PositionbrbrSoftware EngineerbrbrWhat We NeedbrbrAn experienced Software Engineer to work on a crossfunctional team to solve realworld problems for healthcare providers around the country Using your technical expertise you will design build test and improve the features that will enable our customers to effectively run their business and provide patient care If you like solving tough problems being part of a fun team and are tenacious we would like to hear from youbrbrYour Area of FocusbrulliDesign develop document test and debug new and existing software systems and applications liliOwn software subsystems through full development and support lifecycleliliParticipate in full development life cycle including requirements analysis and designliliPartner with manager and participate in software design meetingsliliIdentify opportunities to improve software reuse and scalabilityliliSupport maintain and document software functionalityliliPerform code reviewsliliBring creative and innovative software solutions to the team and identify and evaluate new technologies for implementationliliPartner with team to prototype refine test and debug programs to meet needsliliImprove quality and operational processesliliTriage challenging bugsliliParticipate in software design meetings and analyze user needs to determine technical requirementsbrliulstronguYour Professional Qualificationsbrustrongulli2 years of software development experienceliliProfessional experience developing distributed databasedriven webbased applications with Java and the Spring frameworkliliStrong knowledge in computer architecture design patterns data structures algorithms and objectoriented software techniquesliliTechnical leadership with minimal supervisionliliStrong analytical skills and ability to apply them in daytoday workliliUse data to make technical recommendations and decisionsliliKey contributor to technical team discussions and engineering debatesliliAbility to accurately estimate scope on larger software projectsliliLooks beyond current execution of tasksliliProficient at debugging other engineers codeliliWorking knowledge of HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript and JavaScript frameworks Angular Node ReactliliStrong verbal and written communication skillsbrliulOur Valuesbrulli Passionate  Be Passionately Driven We take pride in our work inspire others to excel and are dedicated to solving tough problems in healthcare We hold ourselves to the highest standards And we work with urgency because what we do matterslili CustomerFocused  Dedicated to Customer Success Helping our customers succeed directs every action we take Were committed to helping their practices run smoother so their patients can thrive We are solutionoriented and aligned with their needslili Collaborative  Together Were Better Great teams are collaborative selfless hardworking and dedicated We are willing to do what it takes to get the job done so we can accomplish more togetherliliGrowing  Constant Growth We strive to have a growth mindset in all we do We reject the status quo We take a unique approach and make every effort to bring clarity to a needlessly complex industry We are creative problem solvers that believe in making things betterbrliulKareo is an equal opportunity employer All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to age race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin veteran or disability status
